knimeNode.name: FeatureTextReader
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node reads all feature elements from the TextExporter node into a KNIME table.

fullDescription.intro: This node can be used to read the output of the TextExporter tool into a KNIME table. The TextExporter, when applied to a featureXML file, writes out information on the contained feature elements. Namely the feature location (mz and rt), intensity, and charge. All these information will be parsed into a KNIME table.

ports.inPort: Incoming text file created with the TextExporter node.
ports.outPort: Table containing the information on the features.
